## Directive.(constructor)

构造方法

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(type?: string, value?: string | Expression, templateMid?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string | _(Optional)_ 类型名 |
|  value | string \| [Expression](./nodom3.expression.md) | _(Optional)_ 指令值 |
|  templateMid | number | _(Optional)_ 模板所属的module id |
